text: Anjem Choudary (; born 1967) is a British former solicitor and Islam preacher. He was the leader and spokesman for the Islamist group Islam4UK until it was banned under the Terrorism Act 2000. Choudary was born in Welling, London to Pakistani parents. He is married to Rubana Akhtar. As of 2006, the couple have three children. ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:1967 births Category:Living people Category:Al-Qaeda people Category:English lawyers Category:British Muslims Category:Criminals from London Category:Islamic State people
title: Anjem Choudary
